com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.event
Class PowerStatusChangedEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.event.PowerStatusChangedEvent

public class PowerStatusChangedEvent
extends Object

This event is posted via the EventBus. Register on the EventBus for this event type to see the data that ExactTarget sends to their servers. Sent whenever the user's device goes to battery_low status or returns to battery_ok status. If you need to turn off services during low-battery situations, you can use this event to change your app's behavior.
